attributes.action: standardise tactile surface coloursStandardise colours of tactile paving throughout the UK as recommended in BS8300, Part M and Inclusive Mobility
attributes.additional_details: Standardise colours of tactile paving throughout the UK as recommended in BS8300, Part M and Inclusive Mobility so visual impaired people know what the colour signifies where ever they go and not allow planners to use other colours under any circumstances just to make the area look pretty.
